🔥 **If you can send a connection request, go for it!**  
📌 **Best approach:**  
✅ **Send the connection request with a short 300-character message**  
✅ **If they accept, follow up with InMail or DM**  

---

### **🔥 300-Character Connection Request Messages**  

📌 **1️⃣ Steve Nouri**  
**"Steve, love your insights on AI & hiring. Running a live AI experiment to test how hiring should work in an AI-first world. Post is gaining traction—would love your take. Let’s connect!"**  

📌 **2️⃣ Allie K. Miller**  
**"Allie, big fan of your AI career insights. I’m testing AI-driven hiring & automation in real time—post is picking up traction. Would love your thoughts. Let’s connect!"**  

📌 **3️⃣ Matt Shumer**  
**"Matt, given your work at HyperWrite, I thought you’d appreciate this—testing AI-driven hiring models live. Post is gaining traction. Would love your take—let’s connect!"**  

📌 **4️⃣ Santiago Valdarrama**  
**"Santiago, your AI job market insights are 🔥. Running a live experiment on how AI itself would hire—post is gaining traction. Curious to hear your thoughts. Let’s connect!"**  

📌 **5️⃣ Louis Bouchard**  
**"Louis, love the work you do at What’s AI? Running a live AI hiring experiment—post is picking up steam. Would love your take. Let’s connect!"**  

---

🔥 **If They Accept → Follow Up With InMail or DM**  
✅ **Send the full message with the post link once they accept.**  
✅ **If they don’t accept within a day or two, send InMail.**  

🚀 **Go ahead and send these—then we track responses & adjust!**
